definition: confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Lily:I'm sorry, I'm feeling carsick. Would you drive a little slower, please?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我有点儿晕车。能开慢点儿吗？
我想我晕车了，有一个才子叫许嵩。

sentences.english: Excuse me? Do you have anything for a carsick ?
But today I didn't feel carsick.
Patches containing the drug scopolamine, used in adults, are not recommended for children.
sentences.chinese: 用的含东莨菪碱的晕车药，儿童应慎用。

sentences.english: Gain a new weapon against motion sickness from this free video on basic acupressure techniques.
sentences.chinese: 对晕车增益从这个免费视频的新武器技术的基本穴位。

sentences.english: Excuse me? Do you have anything for a carsickness?
Why do I get more car sick in the back?
sentences.chinese: 为什么坐在车的后座更容易晕车和不适？

sentences.english: Carsick what drug to take best?
How do you read in the car without feeling sick?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么可以在车里看书而不感到晕车的呢？

sentences.english: I always get carsick when I try to read in a car.
sentences.chinese: 每次在车内试着看书的时候我都会晕车。

sentences.english: My mother would rather walk than take a car because of carsick.
sentences.chinese: 我妈妈宁可步行也不愿坐车，因为她晕车。

sentences.english: Is piggy carsick how to do?
I felt carsick , my nose was stuffed, and I had a headache.
sentences.chinese: 我感到晕车，我鼻子被塞住，并且还头疼。

sentences.english: Carsick with what method the most effective?
sentences.chinese: 晕车用什么方法最有效？

definition: altitude sickness/acute mountain sickness/abbr. to 高反[gao1 fan3]
altitude sickness/abbr. for 高原反應|高原反应[gao1 yuan2 fan3 ying4]
traffic jam/(of traffic) to get congested
